title: Untouched: a Murder Mystery and Erotic Love Story
description: Abby's friend went missing and through the investigation, she met an old flame--sexy, handsome, and hot detective Ethan Webb. It was very obvious they're still sexually attracted to each other. She couldn't resist his kisses, his touch. She didn't know how she survived without him. She was so tired of making do with pleasuring her body on her own and was ready to make a go at romance again when Tara's body was found.Ethan was by her side through her friend's funeral. She couldn't be more grateful for the moment when they could resume where they'd left off.The way he looked at her, the right moment may be very, very near...Can't stand the suspense? Download and find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable. This includes sex, extended orgasms, and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
